     if (el.ypos <= 10 && el.xpos <= 18) { // Max ypos can now be 10 for f-block\n                        grid[(el.ypos - 1) * 18 + (el.xpos - 1)] = el;\n                    }\n                });\n                \n                let tableHTML = '';\n                for (let r = 1; r <= 10; r++) { // Loop through 10 rows now\n                    // Add a spacer div for the gap between main table          for (let c = 1; c <= 18; c++) {\n                        const el = grid[(r - 1) * 18 + (c - 1)];\n                        if (el) {\n                            tableHTML += `<div                     }\n                    }\n                }\n                display.innerHTML = tableHTML;\n            };\n            \n            const showDetails = (element) => {\n filterButtons.querySelector('.active').classList.remove('active');\n                    e.target.classList.add('active');\n                    const category = e.target.dataset.category;\n                    generateTable(category === 'all' ? elements : elements.filter(el => el.category === category));\n                }\n            });\n\n            // Initial generation\n            generateTable();\n        });\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>",

10 && el.xpos <= 18) { // Max ypos can now be 10 for f-block\n                        grid[(el.ypos - 1) * 18 + (el.xpos - 1)] = el;\n                    }\n                });\n                \n <div class=\"name\">${el.name}</div>\n                                          </div>`;\n                        } else {\n                            if (r < 8 || r > 8) { // Only draw empty cells modal.querySelector('#close-modal').addEventListener('click', () => {\n                   modal.style.display = 'none';\n                });\n            };\n\n            display.addEventListener('click', e => {\n                const tile = e.target.closest('.element-tile');\n                if (tile?.dataset.atomicNumber) {\n                    const elementData = elements.find(el => el.atomic_number === parseInt(tile.dataset.atomicNumber));\n                    if (elementData) showDetails(elementData);\n                }\n            });\n\n            searchInput.addEventListener('input', e => {\n                const term = e.target.value.toLowerCase();\n                generateTable(elements.filter(el => el.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) || filterButtons.innerHTML = '<button class=\"filter-btn active\" data-category=\"all\">æ‰€æœ‰</button>' + categories.map(cat => `<button class=\"filter-btn\" data-category=\"${cat}\">${cat}</button>`).join('');\n            filterButtons.addEventListener('click', e => {\n                if (e.target.classList.contains('filter-btn')) {\n                    filterButtons.querySelector('.active').classList.remove('active');\n                    e.target.classList.add('active');\n                    const category = e.target.dataset.category;\n                    generateTable(category === 'all' ? elements : elements.filter(el => el.category === category));\n                }\n            });\n\n            // Initial generation\n            generateTable();\n        });\n    </script>\n</body>\n</html>",
